===Overview===
The '''Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives''' is a federal agency that regulates the illegal production of alcohol and trade of firearms.

===[[Mason County Sheriff's Department]]===
They aided [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] in capturing the corrupt [[Mason County Sheriff's Department]] that was operating a moonshine still and robbing tour buses.{{r|Deadpool Vol 4 #22}}

===Dark Reign===
When [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Norman Osborn]] became head of [[H.A.M.M.E.R. (Earth-616)|H.A.M.M.E.R.]], he offered [[Michael Marko (Earth-616)|Man Mountain Marko]] a job as an ATF agent. He was tasked with hunting down the [[Agents of Atlas (Earth-616)|Agents of Atlas]]. However he was no match for [[Aquaria Neptunia (Earth-616)|Namora]], and was teleported to the desert by the [[Robert Grayson (Earth-616)|Uranian]]. At another mission to the [[Temple of Atlas]], an ATF agent went rogue, but when Marko confronted him he revealed that he was [[James Woo (Earth-616)|Jimmy Woo]]. The Agents of Atlas attacked and Marko fled frightened of Namora. He hid but was found by [[Mr. Lao (Earth-616)|Mr. Lao]] the giant dragon who swallowed up Marko whole.{{r|Agents of Atlas Vol 2 1}} [[Maxwell Markham (Earth-616)|Grizzly]] was also made the commander of a squadron of ATF agents.{{r|Agents of Atlas Vol 2 5}}
